# Lettered Statue Park

This is a pair of [Statue Park](https://puzz.link/rules.html?statuepark) with an additional rule (the rule was in Palmer's original version of Statue Park but has since fallen to the side) - if a black circle has a letter on it, it must have a shape from the bank with that letter.  

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/statuePark1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&a=VY7BDcQwCAR78TsPexPA1GKl/zZyO7+TrJEFw8I5Y617XD8GTFhwwza1IOYjiB84gZPUEycfSFqSVpibnI25cbbrmhO6q+kEsUuyIzlH8hbdmLcT9DAbTAV+4Cf1xC/8olu+WUVa+x9uMh8OZKL8K+cglq/n+LbclttK93iv8/feDw==)
